com.nkoiv.mists.game.world.pathfinding

Class CollisionMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nkoiv.mists.game.world.pathfinding.CollisionMap

  • public class CollisionMap
extends Object
    CollisionMap is a location turned simple This is used for the PathFinding to navigate without having to constantly call in Locations Colliding-functions
    Author:
    daedra

      • updateCollisionLevels

        public void updateCollisionLevels()

      • isBlocked

        public boolean isBlocked(List<Integer> crossableTerrain,
                         int x,
                         int y)
        isBlocked checks if the given unit can pass through the given node returns False if tile is blocked, true if not. Every creature should be able to cross CL 0
        Parameters:
        crossableTerrain - List of terrains the mover can cross
        x - xCoordinate of the checked node
        y - yCoordinate of the checked node
        Returns:
        True if the unit cannot pass to this terrain with given crossableTerrainList
